name: callStackGet
description: Returns an array of structs. Each struct contains template name, line nbr, and if function name (if applicable). This is a snapshot of all function calls or invocations.

examples.title: Tag Syntax
examples.description: This example the factorial of a number is computed.

examples.title: Script Syntax
examples.description: This example the factorial of a number is computed.
examples.code:
numeric function factorial(n) { if(n == 1) writedump(callstackGet()); writeoutput('
'); return 1; } else } writedump(callStackGet()); writeoutput('
'); return n * factorial(n-1); } } factorial(5);
